abstract: The order by the Dubai-based airline for Boeing 777 jets, to be announced Monday, could be worth $7 billion.
snippet: The order by the Dubai-based airline for Boeing 777 jets, to be announced Monday, could be worth $7 billion.
lead_paragraph: Boeing obtained an order for up to 30 of its wide-body 777 jets from Emirates Airline of Dubai in a deal that would be worth nearly $7 billion at list prices, industry officials said Sunday.

headline.main: Officials Say Boeing Won a Jet Order From Emirates
headline.print_headline: Officials Say Boeing Won A Jet Order From Emirates

abstract: The deal is a sign that commercial aviation, and Boeing’s fortunes, are starting to recover from the recession.
snippet: The deal is a sign that commercial aviation, and Boeing’s fortunes, are starting to recover from the recession.
lead_paragraph: The aviation giant Boeing said Monday that it had obtained an order for 30 of its wide-body 777 jets from Emirates Airline of Dubai.

headline.main: Boeing Gets Order for Up to 30 Jets From Dubai
headline.print_headline: Boeing Gets Order for Up to 30 Jets From Dubai
